Reviews.Title: Excelent performance
Reviews.Author: Choncho
Reviews.Content: Visually attractive (the hardware and the software), really different to the other mobile devices, works incredibly fast, no lags at all... IE10 was a surprise I didn't expected. May be the best thing is the screen, good resolution and looks great down the sun light. At the same time, the automatic brightness performs in effective and unnoticeable fashion. Responsive tactile panel... The camera, even not the best, is very good for the price tag and the battery duration is more or less like the other devices (one day and half).The only bad thing is the the app store is not nourished as Windows Phone competitors are, and normally WP is the last platform to get updates from the most popular applications.

Reviews.Title: Great phone for the price
Reviews.Author: Will L "Sleepwalker"
Reviews.Content: Nokia did a great job with this phone. The build quality of the phone is very good, exceeding my expectation for this price range. The back cover is plastic but the color (yellow) with some transparency makes it look fun and fresh. Definitely recommend getting this phone in the fun colors, black is too dull. The display screen quality feels surprisingly good. Good resolution and color.A plus side is that this phone allows you to change battery. The back cover comes off just like the good old times of the not-so-smart-phones.Software wise, the OS and the standard apps feel responsive and easy to use. Buying Nokia will give you access to a bunch of interesting apps. Windows Phone is still lacking in terms of apps, but it have most of the apps that I intent to use so that's okay for me.If you want a good phone for a great price, this is it. If you want to latest and greatest, look elsewhere.

Reviews.Title: Great phone for a reasonable price!
Reviews.Author: Ryan
Reviews.Content: Works great with AT&T.; If you have AT&T; already, just go to a store and get the micro sim for FREE.Network shows as H or H+ instead of 4G.Some minor differences in OS text as it is an international phone (i.e. Favorites is spelled "Favourites"). All the features of the phone I have used work great. Had to setup more of the phone than a US locked phone (speech to text and voice languages) but not a big deal.Phone shows it was manufactured in Malaysia and the carrier is CV Malaysia.Definitely planning on utilizing the microSD slot as after first boot the available internal storage space is about 4GB.Speaker phone is a bit distorted in a call but music playback is clear. Very loud speaker both external and ear.Confirmed this phone ACTUALLY DOES HAVE a dual band WIFI transceiver so I can connect to my 5GHz band.

Reviews.Title: So happy with Lumia and Windows Phone
Reviews.Author: isabel chaparro
Reviews.Content: My iphone got stolen, so I needed a replacement. Since those phones are so expensive I found this one, and I thought that I could keep it untilI could afford a new Iphone. My surprise is that now I don't want any iPhone, I'm really happy with the phone and Windows Phone is so much better and faster that iOS.You're gonna love this product!

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: Morto00x
Reviews.Content: Got this phone since I've been wanting to try Windows phones for a while. After owning several smartphones, I decided to buy something smaller and the 620 was a perfect fit. Plus, it was cheaper than the 920.For this phone I had to buy a GoPhone SIM from Amazon that was already cut for MicroSIM. The activation process was pretty straight forward, and even after activation I was able to port my old Sprint number when its contract ended.I'm giving it 4/5 stars because the loudspeaker stopped working after 2 weeks of use. I decided to take apart the loudspeaker part to see if something burned or broke (using a T4 screwdriver) but didn't see anything unusual. After putting the part back, it started working normally, so I'm assuming the component was lose or not making contact.Compared to my old HTC Evo 3D, the loudspeaker is much clearer and louder. However, the 620's vibrator is pretty much useless since it is way too soft and you can't configure it to vibrate for longer periods of time.

Reviews.Title: great dwvice vfora good price
Reviews.Author: V. Manan "Bookmaster"
Reviews.Content: This device is amazing for the price. You can use office incl outlookk remote wipe it. Nokia has great panoramic camera and store apps.I added a 32 GB micro SD card from eBay for storing media. It hasNFC, can support up to 64 GB of micro SD, decent camera.Not bad for the price

Reviews.Title: Delivery was prompt and works great
Reviews.Author: Shilpa
Reviews.Content: Received it on time. Connected to my wifi and it worked immediately. Recently put the prepaid sim card and I was able to take and make calls.The ad says yellow but it was blue so a 4* else I would give it a 5*

Reviews.Title: Excellent phone, excellent value
Reviews.Author: William Qian
Reviews.Content: Does everything a Windows Phone does, at a bargain price with no contract.  Might not have all the specs of the high end phones, but still runs buttery smooth.  Also love the replaceable colored back covers - makes changing looks easy!

Reviews.Title: Good Entry level smart phone
Reviews.Author: Suhas
Reviews.Content: Great value for money both in terms of one time and recurring cost (If you are on Prepaid plans)If you are looking for smart phone which does your basic work (no fancy high MP camera), this will do.Battery life is great, see the plus side of Nokia hardware.Best part is Windows phone 8 OS, you get the same app support as other high priced lumia phones.

Reviews.Title: 620 rocks!
Reviews.Author: seattle
Reviews.Content: I love this phone, very well build! WP8 is very fast! The apps are coming, I'm happy to have this phone!

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT >>>
Reviews.Author: j2003b
Reviews.Content: Exactly as described! Nokia Lumia 620 Yellow, Factory Unlocked, International Version, Win8 Phone, Middle Eastern Version. Works perfectly! Cheers! A+++

Reviews.Title: Excellent low cost entry into smart phones
Reviews.Author: tuesdays
Reviews.Content: I would give it 5 stars, but the phone came from Saudi Arabia.  As a result, the charger is useless in the United States.  Otherwise I love the phone.

Reviews.Title: Good low price option
Reviews.Author: Joel Dowlath
Reviews.Content: The colours are washed out compared to my Lumia 820, and phone updates are buggy. The screen is smaller, obviously. However, it does run Windows Phone 8 just fine.

Reviews.Title: Very Good Phone
Reviews.Author: 620_Owner
Reviews.Content: Phone came unlocked from a Chinese / Hong Kong service provider. Works well on T-Mobile in the US. 3G / phone antenna seems weak - I had an HTC Android phone previously and it had better coverage in the exact same areas. Camera is OK, not great.The phone is light, sturdy and, personally, just the right size for a cell phone.The yellow case is VERY yellow - nearly fluorescent. I love it.

Reviews.Title: Check your calling area before buying
Reviews.Author: polish$princess "polish$princess"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone from another venue. While I love the phone, you have to buy a GSM micro SIM card that will connect in your area. There are only two GSM carriers in the US, AT& T and T-Mobile (which uses AT & T if not in a T-Mobile area). There are a lot of GSM SIM cards on the market, but all of them require connecting to one of these two networks in the US.Unfortunately, my home town is locked down to only two carriers, there is no AT& T service here, and while T-Mobile advertises 2G voice in my area, in reality it doesn't exist. The phone works great in a town 20 miles away with T-Mobile. Just make absolutely sure your service area can access the two networks. If you live in a major city you'll be fine. One small plus is you can use the phone with WiFi and use Skype if you're stuck without service.

Reviews.Title: Great little phone
Reviews.Author: John B. Gillard
Reviews.Content: If you want a compact Windows 8 phone you should consider this one. I'm using it on the T-Mobile network and I'm certainly satisfied with it's performance.

Reviews.Title: MY WIFE LOVE THIS PERFECT UPGRADE FROM THE HTC TROPHY
Reviews.Author: THE WAY TRUE LIFE "THE WAY TRUE LIFE"
Reviews.Content: I JUST GOT A NOKIA LUMIA 810 WINDOWS PHONE 8, AND JUST LIKE WHEN I GOT MY FIRST WINDOWS PHONE 7 THE HTC HD7 IN 2010, I HAD TO GET MY WIFE THE HTC TROPHY UNLOCKED FOR T-MOBILE, SHE ORIGINALLY WANTED THE IPHONE, BUT WHEN SHE SAW MY WINDOWSPHONE SHE FLEW IN LOVE WITH MICROSOFT'S UNIQUE AND ORIGINAL STYLE, AND NOW I GOT TO UPGRADE HER TO THE NEW NOKIA LUMIA 620, SHE MADE ME PROMISED HER TO GET ONE THAT IS SIMILAR TO HER PREVIOUS FAVORITE, SO HERE IT IS THE PERFECT UPGRADE.... NOW SHE CAN SKYPE ANYTIME EVERYWHERE.... AND IT IS SEXY AND SHE KNOWS IT.... I HIGHLY RECOMMEND ANY. WINDOWS PHONE ESPECIALLY A NOKIA LUMIA, NO MATTER WHICH OF THE MANY HARDWARE CHOICES SAMSUNG NOKIA HTC AND MORE ECT... YOU CHOOSE YOU GET THE GREAT FULLY CUSTOMIZABLE WINDOWS PERFORMANCE, INSTEAD OF GETTING THE SAME BORING DROIDS AND IPHONES.... IT'S TIME TO LIVE WITH LIVE TILES, NOW YOU CAN HAVE A TRULY UNIQUELY PERSONALIZED SMARTPHONE.SINCERE REALLY! JUAN FRANCISCO DIANA A.K.A. EL NINO OWNER OF THE WAY TRUE LIFE"FOR THE GOOD OF ALL" CONNECT WITH ME ON TWITTER LINKEDIN FACEBOOK AND YOUTUBE, MY EMAIL IS THEWAYTRUELIFEIS@LIVE.COM ....
